devdoc.details: Bridge contract for $UNREAL utility token with 1inch Fusion+ integration Implements hashlock/timelock mechanism for cross-chain atomic swaps

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

completeBridgeIntent(bytes32,bytes32).details: Complete bridge intent by revealing secret

createBridgeIntent(uint256,uint256,bytes.details: Create a bridge intent with hashlock/timelock

params.hashlock: Hash of the secret (keccak256 of secret)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refundBridgeIntent(bytes32).details: Refund bridge intent after timelock expires

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setUnrealToken(address).details: Emergency function to update UNREAL token address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: UnrealBridge
